game.name: FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY'S: HELP WANTED
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted is a collection of classic and original mini-games set in the Five Nights universe. Experience the horror in flat (non-VR) mode or VR. Oculus Rift and HTC Vive are supported. A VR Headset is NOT required to play.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted is a collection of classic and original mini-games set in the Five Nights universe. Experience the horror in flat (non-VR) mode or VR. Oculus Rift and HTC Vive are supported. A VR Headset is NOT required to play.

reviewHighlights.text: 게임 시작 설정할 떄 오류 있는거 빼면 그야말로 최고의 게임
